RTCRtpSenderGetCapabilities_static.summary: The static method RTCRtpSender.getCapabilities() returns an object describing the codec and header extension capabilities supported by the .

remarks.para: You can, similarly, obtain the capabilities of objects on the device by calling the static function .

RTCRtpSenderGetCapabilities_static.returns:
A new object that indicates what capabilities the browser has for sending the specified media kind over an .
If the browser doesn't have any support for the given media kind, the returned value is null.The returned object has the following properties:
